description:
Discover your “Vardag” (everyday) beanie – soft, warm lambswool with a two-layer knit and a wide folded edge to keep you warm, every day.

  • 100% traceable wool combines a lightweight feel with quick-drying properties
  • Cuff adds extra warmth where it’s needed most
  • Part of the “Vardag” (everyday) collection, these items are designed to keep you comfy day in and day out
name: Fjallraven 1960 Logo Hat - Unisex
